document.full_text: barack obama told americans on saturday there is no "magic bullet" to bring down high gasoline prices and said he wants to end what he called $4 billion in taxpayer subsidies to oil and gas companies.
document.title: obama sees no magic bullet to push down gas prices
lines_and_colors: barack obama told americans on saturday there is no "magic bullet" to bring down high gasoline prices and said he wants to end what he called $4 billion in taxpayer subsidies to oil and gas companies.
